title: Understanding Consistent Routines
text: Consistent routines help children feel secure and understand what to expect next. This can reduce anxiety and improve behavior.

title: Management Methods at Home
text: Using management methods that work at home can help reinforce positive behaviors and provide a sense of stability for the child.

title: Evaluating the Statement
text: Consider whether creating consistent routines and using effective management methods at home can support a child and their family.
